data.value: (all diameters are measured between the inner edges in B-mode)
3.  Sinus of Valsalva (end of diastole), cm
6.  Arch of the aorta (end of diastole), cm
1. maximum diameter of the left atrium (LA) (measured between the inner edges in B-mode, parasternal access along the long axis), cm
2. Maximum volume of the left atrium (apical access, 4-chamber position, Simpson algorithm) (LAvol), ml
3.  LA volume index (ml/m2)= LAvol / body surface area (BSA)
4. Left atrium area (apical access, 4-chamber position), cm2
1.  Maximum diastolic dimension of interventricular septum, cm
2.  Maximum diastolic dimension of left ventricular posterior wall, cm
5.  LV end-diastolic volume (apical access, 4-chamber position, Simpson algorithm), ml
6.  LV end-systolic volume (apical access, 4-chamber position, Simpson algorithm), cm
Diastolic function of the left ventricle
Average E/e’ = (E / septal e’ + E / lateral e’) / 2
Regional abnormalities of left ventricular contractility
Right ventricle free wall thickness, subcostal view, cm
Mid-RV measured in the four-chamber view, cm
Tricuspid annular plane systolic excursion (TAPSE), cm
Regional abnormalities of right ventricular contractility
maximum volume of the right atrium (apical access, 4-chamber position, Simpson algorithm) (RAvol), ml
RA volume index (ml/m2)= RAvol / body surface area(BSA)
3. Mitral regurgitation flow area / Left atrium area, %
1. Peak pressure gradient, mm of mercury column
2. AVA Aortic valve orifice area, cm2
3. Aortic valve orifice area index = AVA Aortic valve orifice area / body surface area (BSA)
1.  Blood flow area of tricuspid regurgitation, cm2
2.  Vena contracta of tricuspid regurgitation, cm
4.  Піковий градієнт тиску Peak pressure gradient, mm of mercury column
3.  Tricuspid Valve area (only if signs of stenosis present), cm2
End-diastolic distance of echo-free space visceral-parietal pericardium trivial (seen only in systole)
Максимальний діаметер нижньої порожнистої вени Maximum diameter of inferior vena cava, sm
Inferior vena cava collapse on inspiration, %

<style>
    .v-input__control {
        line-height:1.1;
    }
    .v-input--selection-controls__input {
        height: 10px;
    }
    .v-input--selection-controls__ripple, 
    .v-input--selection-controls.v-input--dense .v-input--selection-controls__ripple
    {
        width: 21px;
        height: 21px;
        left: -5px;
        top: calc(50% - 18px) !important;
    }
    .v-textarea textarea {
     line-height:1.1;   
    }
    .v-text-field > .v-input__control > .v-input__slot > .v-text-field__slot {
        font-size: 14px;
        
    }    
    .v-input--selection-controls__input .v-icon {
    width: 100%;
    font-size: 20px;
    }
    
    
    .q-title {
        padding: 2px 0;
        background: #efefef;
    }
    
    .v-label {
        font-size: 14px;
    }
    
    .framed {
        margin: 10px 0 0 2px;
    }
        .active {
        background:#e5eff5;
    }
    .note-border {
        padding: 0 2px;
        margin: 0 5px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #dedede;
        line-height: 1 !important;
    }
    .note-dense{
        line-height: 1 !important;
    }
    .widget-hidden {
        background: red;
        display:none;
    }
    
    
    .markdown-body p, .markdown-body blockquote, .markdown-body ul, .markdown-body ol, .markdown-body dl, .markdown-body table, .markdown-body pre {
        margin-top: 0;
        margin-bottom: 5px;
        line-height: 1.1;
    }
    
    .markdown-body h1, .markdown-body h2, .markdown-body h3, .markdown-body h4, .markdown-body h5, .markdown-body h6 {
        margin-top: 10px;
        margin-bottom: 12px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 1.25;
    }
    
</style>
